lead_paragraph: The U.F.C. president Dana White said vuvuzelas are being banned for Saturday’s fight in Las Vegas between the heavyweight champion Brock Lesnar and Shane Carwin, the interim belt holder.
snippet: The U.F.C. president Dana White said vuvuzelas are being banned for Saturday’s fight in Las Vegas between the heavyweight champion Brock Lesnar and Shane Carwin, the interim belt holder.
